Title: Water Hygiene Testing & Equipment Maintenance

This appointment has been made under the Eastern Procurement Limited Compliance framework Lot 5 Water Hygiene (Contract Notice 2017/S 213-441896; Contract Finder notice published 9 October 2017).

Title: Contract for the undertaking and production of water hygiene risk assessments and audits
Description:
Overall description - This contract is for the purpose of undertaking and producing water hygiene risk assessments and to review them at suitable frequencies or when they no longer reflect the use of a property or the water systems within it.

The works covered by this contract are intended to:

Comply with the requirement of the Approved Code of Practice L8 (the control of legionella bacteria in water systems) to maintain current legionella risk assessments
Assess the risk of scalding
Assess compliance with the water regulations. 

This will be achieved by the successful contractor undertaking site based surveys and audits to produce water hygiene risk assessments that shall be issued to the Contract Administrator. 

The systems to be covered by this Contract are both hot and cold domestic systems, together with any permanently connected equipment including rainwater harvesting systems but excluding air conditioning equipment, swimming pools and hydrotherapy pools.

Title: THCH - Water Hygiene Risk Assessments and Monitoring Services  - AWARD
Description:
Tower Hamlets Community Housing wish to appoint an experienced service provider to the review of existing water hygiene risk assessment, new water hygiene risk assessments, water hygiene monitoring and cyclical maintenance at properties owned/managed by THCH. Full details related to the scope of services to be procured are included within Document B - Tender Requirements and Specification.
      
      It is intended that the contract established following the procurement will run for an initial term of five years, extendable for a further term of three year plus two years, to a maximum term of ten years.  Any extension will be at the discretion of THCH.  The estimated contract value for water hygiene risk assessments and on-going monitoring services is Â£50,000 (exc VAT) per annum.  
      
      Tower Hamlets Community Housing ("THCH") issued an Invitation to Tender to approved contractors under Category 14 - Legionella Testing and Category 15 - Legionella - Treatment of the Procurement for Housing Compliance Services & Associated Works, OJEU Contract Notice - 2018/S 171-388633.

Title: Eastern Procurement Compliance Framework
Description:
Compliance services in the East of England for Members of Eastern Procurement Consortium.
lots include:
Fire Alarms/Detection Systems, Emergency Lighting Systems, Fighting Equipment Service/Maintenance, Intruder Alarm Installation, Warden Call/OAP Alarms/Other Alarm Installations, CCTV Fire Installations, Controlled Door Entry Maintenance, Automatic Door Installation, PA Systems, Servicing and Maintenance, Communal Digital TV/Satellite TV Aerials and Distribution Systems
Communal Gas Heating, Commercial Gas Fired Central Boiler installations, Commercial Oil And Biomass Central Boiler installations, Biannual Servicing Requirements.
Lifts Installation and Refurbishments, Lifts Maintenance
Platform lift/Stair Lifts/Hoists Installation and Refurbishments, Platform Lift/Stair Lifts/ Hoists Maintenance
Water Hygiene Testing, Water Treatment Equipment Maintenance, Thermostatic Mixing Valve Maintenance
Commercial Catering Equipment Maintenance, Communal/Catering Kitchen Deep Cleaning, Communal/Catering Kitchen Ventilation Canopy Cleaning, Communal /Commercial Laundry Equipment Maintenance
External Car Park, Communal and Street Lighting
Landlords Electrical Installations and Testing including PAT.

Removal of Licenced Asbestos

Customer Satisfaction Survey Service
